channel.title: Comments on: Kena: Bridge of Spirits Effortlessly defeating Sprout Captain on Master difficulty.

item.title: By: Paulsonmn31
item.dc:creator: Paulsonmn31
item.description: Sorry if this is a stupid question but is this on PS4? How well does it run?
item.content:encoded: Sorry if this is a stupid question but is this on PS4? How well does it run?

item.title: By: FoulTarnished124
item.dc:creator: FoulTarnished124
item.description:
Ah man you were so close to no-hitting the fight, such a shame
He doesn't have too much health, is it an earlier level boss?
item.content:encoded:
Ah man you were so close to no-hitting the fight, such a shame

He doesn’t have too much health, is it an earlier level boss?

item.title: By: seajeremy

item.description: You can play this on a PS4 pro??
item.content:encoded: You can play this on a PS4 pro??

item.title: By: DevilBomb76
item.dc:creator: DevilBomb76
item.description:
Any tips for parrying?
Their long pullbacks before attacking keep messing up my timing. I'm getting better, just need to get used to the window for them I guess.
item.content:encoded:
Any tips for parrying?

Their long pullbacks before attacking keep messing up my timing.
I’m getting better, just need to get used to the window for them I guess.

item.title: By: jakemoee
item.dc:creator: jakemoee
item.description: This looks a bit like God of War 2018. How's the combat, looks pretty simple atleast compared to GoW
item.content:encoded: This looks a bit like God of War 2018. How’s the combat, looks pretty simple atleast compared to GoW

item.title: By: Olav_Grey
item.dc:creator: Olav_Grey
item.description: I've been tossing up getting this game since release. It looks really good, love the look of the world but I don't know. Is it open world (even a little?) or is it really linear. How long is it?
item.content:encoded: I’ve been tossing up getting this game since release. It looks really good, love the look of the world but I don’t know. Is it open world (even a little?) or is it really linear. How long is it?

item.description: The Legend of Witcher : Ragnarok Dawn

item.title: By: YoungestOldGuy
item.dc:creator: YoungestOldGuy
item.description: I must be imagining it, but it seems to me that on Expert you deal more damage with your attacks than on normal difficulty?
item.content:encoded: I must be imagining it, but it seems to me that on Expert you deal more damage with your attacks than on normal difficulty?

item.title: By: dapostman10
item.dc:creator: dapostman10
item.description: Is this game similar to Immortals? I am playing that right now and I feel overwhelmed with how much there is to do.
item.content:encoded: Is this game similar to Immortals? I am playing that right now and I feel overwhelmed with how much there is to do.
